topic.title: Discuss (U1): Earth Systems
topic.text:
Earth's Systems include the 4 major spheres of the earth:

  • Geosphere – the solid earth.
  • Hydrosphere – the watery part of our planet.
  • Atmosphere – the gaseous layer above.
  • Biosphere – the living realm of organisms.
Honestly from real life, identify which of these terms you have heard used and describe in what context they were referenced (e.g. wildfires in California, water issues in the World, etc.). 
  • Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.
  • Respond to at least two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59pm.
    • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
 
Since this is a direct study, the questions are going to be more broad and you will get more interaction with me by posting  answers for discussion. :)
